G

Game - Class in com.robert.pong
 
Game() - Constructor for class com.robert.pong.Game
 
GameWorld - Class in com.robert.pong
Represents the world of Pong.
GameWorld(int, int) - Constructor for class com.robert.pong.GameWorld
Creates a GameWorld, that is the backend of the game of Pong, for a certain screen size.
getBall() - Method in class com.robert.pong.GameWorld
Gets the Ball of this GameWorld.
getCircle() - Method in class com.robert.pong.Ball
Gets the circle that represents this ball.
getFirstPaddle() - Method in class com.robert.pong.GameWorld
Gets the first Paddle of this GameWorld (the left Paddle).
getHeight() - Method in class com.robert.pong.Paddle
Gets the height of this Paddle.
getInitialState() - Method in class com.robert.pong.Ball
Gets the initial state vector (position) of this ball.
getPosition() - Method in class com.robert.pong.Ball
Gets the position vector of this ball (the coordinates of the center).
getPosition() - Method in class com.robert.pong.Paddle
Gets the position of the bottom-left corner of this Paddle.
getRadius() - Method in class com.robert.pong.Ball
Gets the radius of this ball.
getRectangle() - Method in class com.robert.pong.Paddle
Gets the rectangle that represents this paddle.
getSecondPaddle() - Method in class com.robert.pong.GameWorld
Gets the second Paddle of this GameWorld (the right Paddle).
getSpeed() - Method in class com.robert.pong.Ball
Gets the speed vector of this ball.
getWidth() - Method in class com.robert.pong.Paddle
Gets the width of this Paddle.
